title: Where can I get up-to-date technology information? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are multiple tech websites like gsmsrena, Androidpolice, Anandtech, theverge, Engadget, arstechnicia which cover technology industry. Also there are multiple youtubers who cover technology. These are sources where you can get technology information

There is no specific place where you can go and get up-to-date with the technology.You need to sit at night and view various videos on YouTube if you don't want to read the article but if you can then just search Tech on Google and tap the news tab afterwards and start reading them or Just search Tech news and go to the blogs then read them.
